name: core_inventory_journey_evaluation
description: Test the core inventory management journey from login to supplier management

User authentication system should load with role-based access control (admins, managers, staff)

steps.action: Fill login form with username 'admin' and password 'admin123'
steps.expected: Should authenticate admin user and grant access to dashboard
Dashboard should display overview of inventory status, alerts, and key metrics
Product catalog management should load with categories, variants, pricing, and supplier information
Should allow managing product categories, variants, pricing, and supplier information
Real-time inventory tracking should load with barcode scanning, stock levels, and automated reorder points
Should display real-time stock levels, barcode scanning capability, and automated reorder points
Purchase order management system should load with supplier integration and approval workflows
